name: Lucky Pusher-Win Big Rewards
description:
Lucky Pusher brings you carnival fun! Play the best coin pusher game today!

Join the millions of people playing Lucky Pusher, the original coin pusher game! Master the mania of this addictive coin dropping game. Relax, push, and collect prizes!

How to play
- Drop the nickles down and push the coins off the board, and the prizes will go into your account!
- Make those coins go into the yellow box to play the slot machine!
- Use tools to make the whole process easier!

Lucky Pusher offers free coins for the chance to win rewards. Our mission is to give everyone a risk-free opportunity for prizes.

Feature
- One tap and easy control
- 1000+ exciting levels.
- Beautiful graphics and animation.
- Addictive gameplay.
- Excellent time killer game.
- 30+ various coins to unlock.

Download Lucky Pusher and see if this is your Lucky Pusher!

*Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Pusher and/or the sweepstakes prize.
